deps.context: find_package(sfml 2 config components system window graphics required)
find_package(sfml 2 components system window graphics required)

libs.content:
find_library(sdl2_image_library
  names sdl2_image
  hints
    env sdl2imagedir
    env sdl2dir
  path_suffixes lib ${vc_lib_path_suffix}
)

find_library(sfml_${find_sfml_component_upper}_library_release
                     names sfml-${find_sfml_component_lower}
                     path_suffixes lib64 lib
                     paths ${find_sfml_paths})

find_library(sfml_${find_sfml_component_upper}_library_debug
                     names sfml-${find_sfml_component_lower}-d
                     path_suffixes lib64 lib
                     paths ${find_sfml_paths})

find_library(sfml_${find_sfml_component_upper}_library_static_release
                     names sfml-${find_sfml_component_lower}-s
                     path_suffixes lib64 lib
                     paths ${find_sfml_paths})

find_library(sfml_${find_sfml_component_upper}_library_static_debug
                     names sfml-${find_sfml_component_lower}-s-d
                     path_suffixes lib64 lib
                     paths ${find_sfml_paths})

find_library(sfml_${find_sfml_component_upper}_library_dynamic_release
                     names sfml-${find_sfml_component_lower}
                     path_suffixes lib64 lib
                     paths ${find_sfml_paths})

find_library(sfml_${find_sfml_component_upper}_library_dynamic_debug
                     names sfml-${find_sfml_component_lower}-d
                     path_suffixes lib64 lib
                     paths ${find_sfml_paths})
find_library(${output} names ${argn} paths ${find_sfml_paths} path_suffixes lib no_system_environment_path)

find_library(${allegro_lib_each}_lib
        names
            "${allegro_lib_each}.5.2"
            "${allegro_lib_each}"
        paths
            /usr/lib
            /usr/local/lib
            /opt/local/lib
            /sw/lib
            ${cmake_binary_dir}/packages/allegro.5.*/build/native/${al_lib_type}/lib  
    )

find_library(ponder_libraries
             names ponder
             path_suffixes lib
             paths ${find_ponder_paths})

find_library(sdl2_ttf_library
  names sdl2_ttf
  hints
    env sdl2ttfdir
    env sdl2dir
  path_suffixes lib ${vc_lib_path_suffix}
)
find_library(gdiplus_library names libgdiplus gdiplus)

find_library( glfw_glfw_library
            names
                glfw32
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/x64"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
            paths
                "${opengl_library_dir}"
                /usr/lib
                /usr/lib/w32api
                /usr/local/lib
                /usr/x11r6/lib
            doc
                "the glfw library"
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library
            names
                glfw3
                glfw
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib/${glfw_lib_type}"
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/x64"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib/x64"
            paths
                "$env{programfiles}/glfw/lib"
                "${opengl_library_dir}"
            doc
                "the glfw library"
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library glfw
            names
                glfw
                glfw3
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/cocoa"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib/cocoa"
            paths
                /usr/local/lib
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library
            names
                glfw
                glfw3
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/x11"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib/x11"
            paths
                /usr/lib64
                /usr/lib
                /usr/lib/${cmake_library_architecture}
                /usr/local/lib64
                /usr/local/lib
                /usr/local/lib/${cmake_library_architecture}
                /usr/openwin/lib
                /usr/x11r6/lib
            doc
                "the glfw library"
        )
find_library(d2d1_lib d2d1 ${direct2d_library_paths} no_default_path)
find_library(dwrite_lib dwrite ${direct2d_library_paths} no_default_path)
find_library(dx11_lib d3d11 ${dx_library_paths} no_default_path)
find_library(d3dcomp_lib d3dcompiler ${dx_library_paths} no_default_path)

find_library(irrlicht_library names libirrlicht.so libirrlicht.a irrlicht
		paths
		/usr/local/lib
		/usr/lib
		/system/develop/lib 
	)
find_library(dx9_lib d3dx9 ${dx9_library_paths} no_default_path)

find_program(hhc_program
            names hhc.exe
            paths "c:/program files/html help workshop"
            doc "html help compiler program")
